name: IBM Lotus SameTime Unyte
overview: IBM Lotus Sametime Unyte provides online meeting and communication solutions for customers in the United States and internationally. Its solutions include Lotus Sametime Unyte Share, a collaboration plug-in that allows one-on-one application viewing for colleagues, friends, and family members; LotusLive Meetings, an online meeting service that includes application and desktop sharing, recording, polling, audiocasting, and videocasting features; and LotusLive Events, an event management service, which helps users to create, host, and manage Webinars. The company was formerly known as WebDialogs, Inc. and changed its name to IBM Lotus Sametime Unyte in August 2007. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Westford, Massachusetts. IBM Lotus Sametime Unyte operates as a subsidiary of Lotus Development Corp.
